protocol_name: Immediate Metabolic Response to LPS in Monocytes
protocol_name_html: Immediate Metabolic Response to LPS in Monocytes

materials.reagent_name: Pipettes and P1000 P200 P10 tips

status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"8gd6e","text":"Turn on XFp analyzer to warm up overnight","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1khjm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"vgis","text":"Hydrate XFp sensor cartridge","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"c8bnc","text":"    Add 200 \u03bcl XF calibration solution (included with FluxPak) to each well. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"e2ddu","text":"    Add 400 \u03bcl sterile PBS or H2O to each moat. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":31,"length":1,"style":"sub"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dp966","text":"    Incubate overnight at 37oC in non-CO2 incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":28,"length":1,"style":"sup"},{"offset":40,"length":1,"style":"sub"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"17760AB0CB3411E88201AF5239C6E87A","id":672618,"previous_guid":null,"section":"Day Prior to Assay"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9d161","text":"Seahorse DMEM Media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":19,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9m45c","text":"Add 50 \u03bcl pyruvate, 50 \u03bcl L-glutamine, 20 \u03bcl glucose to 5 ml Seahorse Base Medium. Sterile filter before use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9b0qd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bhohl","text":"Cell-Tak coated XFp plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":26,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6ebhl","text":"Prepare Cell-Tak. Add Cell-Tak and sodium hydroxide to 0.1 M sodium bicarbonate so that each well will receive 0.56 \u03bcg Cell-Tak, and sodium hydroxide concentration will be 0.63 mM. Cell-Tak concentration varies by batch, so calculations for each new batch will need to be performed. Add 25 \u03bcl Cell-Tak solution to each well. Plate can be stored at room temperature (at least 20 minutes) until use (for a few hours). Plates can also be prepped prior to assay day by incubating plates in Cell-Tak (at least 20 minutes), then aspirating remaining solution, air drying, and storing at 4oC until use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":582,"length":1,"style":"sup"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b92to","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5sqlk","text":"Monocytes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":9,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"473kc","text":"Monocytes should be prepared as directed in the monocyte isolation protocol. Isolated monocytes should be diluted to a concentration of 3\u00d7106 cells \/ ml in prepared Seahorse DMEM media prior to use in the assay. Use monocytes immediately.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":140,"length":1,"style":"sup"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"25F596F0CB3411E88201AF5239C6E87A","id":672620,"previous_guid":"17760AB0CB3411E88201AF5239C6E87A","section":"Materials to Prepare"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6g45d","text":"Add 50 \u03bcl medium to wells A and H and 50 \u03bcl cells to wells B-G. Samples are generally run in duplicate or triplicate on each plate. Cell number is 1.5\u00d7105 cells per well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":153,"length":1,"style":"sup"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"4F695080CB3411E88201AF5239C6E87A","id":672622,"previous_guid":"3F64D1F0CB3411E88201AF5239C6E87A","section":"Procedure"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5u1io","text":"Place plate in the carrier and place in centrifuge. Spin 300\u00d7g for 1 minute without brake.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":61,"length":1,"style":"italic"},{"offset":76,"length":13,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"61267B90CB3411E88201AF5239C6E87A","id":672624,"previous_guid":"4F695080CB3411E88201AF5239C6E87A","section":"Procedure"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2g5qj","text":"Add 130 \u03bcl assay medium to each well A-H (final volume 180 \u03bcl).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"67E74DB0CB3411E88201AF5239C6E87A","id":672625,"previous_guid":"61267B90CB3411E88201AF5239C6E87A","section":"Procedure"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"60r1h","text":"Incubate plate at 37oC in non-CO2 incubator for 1 hour.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":20,"length":1,"style":"sup"},{"offset":32,"length":1,"style":"sub"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"6CE428B0CB3411E88201AF5239C6E87A","id":672626,"previous_guid":"67E74DB0CB3411E88201AF5239C6E87A","section":"Procedure"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"97qn9","text":"Prepare LPS dilution ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"95v1l","text":"   Thaw 1 \u03bcg\/ml LPS stock","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6npot","text":"   Dilute 30 \u03bcl LPS stock in 270 \u03bcl assay medium (100 ng\/ml)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"7E1148C0CB3411E88201AF5239C6E87A","id":672628,"previous_guid":"713867A0CB3411E88201AF5239C6E87A","section":"Procedure"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6tmts","text":"Remove sensor cartridge from incubator and remove and reinsert sensors briefly to clear air bubbles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"8689B5F0CB3411E88201AF5239C6E87A","id":672629,"previous_guid":"7E1148C0CB3411E88201AF5239C6E87A","section":"Procedure"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2dc4t","text":"Fill cartridge:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fjvfs","text":" Port A (wells A-D, H): 20 \u03bcl assay medium (media control condition)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":44,"length":23,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5bfpj","text":" Port A (wells E-G): 20 \u03bcl LPS dilution (10 ng\/ml final concentration)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ebglc","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"qrp4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"key":"1tbm2","text":"The listed plate setup is for a comparison between LPS and media in triplicate. This can be varied depending on the research question. For example, we compare LPS responses +\/- glucose in triplicate in this assay. We have also used media, LPS, and an inhibitor+LPS in duplicate in this assay.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}}],"guid":"8B1B7310CB3411E88201AF5239C6E87A","id":672630,"previous_guid":"8689B5F0CB3411E88201AF5239C6E87A","section":"Procedure"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fk96j","text":"Set up program on Seahorse XFp and calibrate sensor cartridge (remove lid).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":63,"length":10,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fvh3m","text":"   Basal: 5 measurements","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a36v0","text":"   Injection 1: 23 measurements","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"9D037EB0CB3411E88201AF5239C6E87A","id":672632,"previous_guid":"8B1B7310CB3411E88201AF5239C6E87A","section":"Procedure"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9dtf3","text":"After 1 hour cell incubation, remove utility plate from XFp and insert cell plate (remove lid).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":83,"length":10,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"A41CF820CB3411E88201AF5239C6E87A","id":672633,"previous_guid":"9D037EB0CB3411E88201AF5239C6E87A","section":"Procedure"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ttqd","text":"After run is completed, image each well by photomicroscopy or collect and isolate protein from each well to normalize cell numbers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"AB4601F0CB3411E88201AF5239C6E87A","id":672635,"previous_guid":"A82DEC80CB3411E88201AF5239C6E87A","section":"Procedure"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8fs7d","text":"Data can be analyzed in several ways. The magnitude of the ECAR response can be measured by max ECAR - min ECAR or simply by max ECAR. The overall response kinetics are best measured by area under the curve (trapezoidal method).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":91,"length":21,"style":"bold"},{"offset":125,"length":8,"style":"bold"},{"offset":185,"length":21,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6pluu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5ffo7","text":"An example assay is shown in Figure 1.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"duh7v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a7j0o","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"bgdvb","text":"Figure 1. Example assay","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":8,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b0tlo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"30897","guid":"D1156BA0CB3411E88201AF5239C6E87A","source":"https:\/\/s3.amazonaws.com\/pr-journal\/8fth4nn.jpg","placeholder":"","original_name":"lps.jpg","mime":"image\/jpeg","width":null,"height":null,"is_video":false}}],"guid":"AEA818B0CB3411E88201AF5239C6E87A","id":672636,"previous_guid":"AB4601F0CB3411E88201AF5239C6E87A","section":"Data Analysis"}
